Question: This person received 41 percent of the vote, while George W Bush received 15 percent, George H W.
Hints: This person made economic growth, job creation and educational improvement high priorities.
This person signed the Brady Bill into law on November 30, 1993, which imposed a five-day waiting period on handgun purchases.
This person brought Israeli Prime Minister Ehud Barak and Palestinian Authority Chairman Yasser Arafat together at Camp David.
